vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰουλία, -ας, ἡ
Julia: Rom.16:15.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Julia, "of Julian [the family of Julius Caesar]"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.15
§ Julia, "of Julian [the family of Julius Caesar]"
Julia, (Proper name), Rom. 16:15*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
猶利亞 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "柔軟頭髮的"
一個女性基督徒 (羅 16:15)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
犹利亚 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "柔软头发的"
一个女性基督徒 (罗 16:15)
